entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -21.8°C

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
